messages.text: Several exciting new plugins were integrated into ElizaOS today:

text: Arbitrage Plugin: Enables cryptocurrency arbitrage trading across DEXs.
Mind Network Plugin: Added Mind Network integration.
Quick Intel Plugin: Performs token security analysis.
Bittensor BitMind API: Integrates Bittensor's API for image detection and reporting functionalities.
Form Chain Plugin: Adds functionality for formPlugin with Form mainnet and testnet.
Email Automation Plugin: Provides intelligent email evaluation and automation.
Moralis Plugin: Introduces Solana APIs and additional token data functionality.
Zerion Plugin: Integrates Zerion's API features.

messages.text: Multiple bug fixes have been addressed today:

text: Twitter HomeTimeline API Bug: Fixed an issue with name retrieval.
Topics Formatting Bug: Corrected the display format within the composeState module.
Bitcoin (BTC): Rose by 10.93% to $104,692 with a market cap of $2 trillion.
Ethereum (ETH): Increased by 32.91% in value, now priced at $3,330.07.
Solana (SOL): Witnessed a 4.21% rise, trading at $256.16.
ai16z Token: Grew 9.26% to $0.8786, showcasing notable volume activity.

messages.text: New deployment options have been added for easier use:
One-click deployment options are now available for Render.com, Railway, and DigitalOcean platforms.
